comment.author: 44874889@N06
comment._content: The man standing between the two aircraft is famed aviator and air race pilot Roscoe Turner.  He won the Bendix Trophy flying the Gilmore Red Lion (Wedell-Williams Model 44)-- the smaller of the two pictured.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/44874889@N06] According to C.M. Daniels "Gilmore Red Line configuration did not win Bendix Trophy.  Trophy was won after Gilmore was re-fitted with a larger engine and gold paint job."
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
